item.title: [pi]Command cooldown?
item.dc:creator: @reward reward
item.description:
@reward wrote:

Was just wondering if a sort of “cooldown” type effect would be possible when you execute a command, for example
I have a vote command, and i want it to only be able to be used once every 24 hours.

Here is my command

if(playerCommand.startsWith("vote") && c.playerRights <= 0) { if (c.vote == 1){ c.sendMessage("You have already voted, type ::reward to claim your prize"); } else if (c.vote == 0) { c.vote = 1; c.getPA().sendFrame126("www.silivion.ucoz.com", 12000); }}
